name: ELITE DANGEREUSE
description: Space shooter with a cool game feel. It's a tribute to a famous space opera game. I thought the game as a die and retry, so it's a bit difficult but you gain a lot of skill by training. There are four levels, each has a different objective and a different boss, you gain power-ups between levels. I hope you will have fun, I worked a lot the game feel in flight. SAVE THE UNIVERSE COMMANDER !!
